name: atom-autocomplete-swift-sourcekitten
description: Swift autocompletion for Atom, using SourceKitten.
author: Sam Deane <sam@elegantchaos.com> (http://elegantchaos.com)

sourceKittenLocation.title: SourceKitten Location
sourceKittenLocation.description:
The binary to run to obtain completions.
 
Default behaviour if this setting is left empty is to search for a command called `sourcekitten`, but you can specify an explicit path or different command here if required.
